# hello

This is a dummy package named hello, that momentarily only includes the
functions
[`hello()`](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/reference/hello.md)
and
[`hello_detect_language()`](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/reference/hello_detect_language.md).
To get started, see [Get
started](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/articles/hello.html),
which is a vignette.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`dictionary`](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/reference/dictionary.md)
  : Dictionary of greetings in five languages
- [`hello()`](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/reference/hello.md)
  : Says hello
- [`hello_detect_language()`](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/reference/hello_detect_language.md)
  : Detect language

- [hello_detect_language](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/articles/hello_detect_language.md):
- [hello](https://wolfmissotten.github.io/Repo_package_hello/articles/hello.md):
